title: Contemporary NSW Coastal Escape Steps from Newcastle Beach
description: Breathe in fresh sea air and bask in spectacular ocean views when you stay at Newcastle's only beachfront hotel, Noah's on the Beach. Just steps away from the city centre and harbour, along the shores of Newcastle Beach, this contemporary haven is perfectly appointed to explore the sites from land and sea. Dine on ocean-fresh seafood at Noah's restaurant, take long walks along the coast and experience the best of the city's after-hours fun in the heart of the city from this central base.
offer_address: 29 Zaara Street, Newcastle East, NSW 2300, Australia
